## Description {#details}

Template for the abstract base class used to dispatch polymorphically over pass objects.

## Public Member Functions

### isRequired() {#aab65a1248cdc6b5fbd15a60afa528fa8}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename IRUnitT, typename AnalysisManagerT, typename... ExtraArgTs&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>virtual bool llvm::detail::PassConcept&lt; IRUnitT, AnalysisManagerT, ExtraArgTs &gt;::isRequired () const</>}>
Polymorphic method to let a pass optionally exempted from skipping by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passinstrumentation">PassInstrumentation</a>.

To opt-in, pass should implement <code>static bool <a href="#aab65a1248cdc6b5fbd15a60afa528fa8">isRequired()</a></code>. It&#39;s no-op to have <code>isRequired</code> always return false since that is the default.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passmanagerinternal-h/#l00062">62</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passmanagerinternal-h">PassManagerInternal.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### run() {#af397f5b2bf1d7cdc52a6032047f8fbc4}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename IRUnitT, typename AnalysisManagerT, typename... ExtraArgTs&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>virtual PreservedAnalyses llvm::detail::PassConcept&lt; IRUnitT, AnalysisManagerT, ExtraArgTs &gt;::run (IRUnitT &amp; IR, AnalysisManagerT &amp; AM, ExtraArgTs... ExtraArgs)</>}>
The polymorphic API which runs the pass over a given IR entity.

Note that actual pass object can omit the analysis manager argument if desired. Also that the analysis manager may be null if there is no analysis manager in the pass pipeline.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passmanagerinternal-h/#l00049">49</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passmanagerinternal-h">PassManagerInternal.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
